website_summaries.verdict: Offers a unique percussive tone with well-made shell construction more suited for modern/popular music styles.
pros: Outer drum shells use hickory wood to create a unique, piercing sound
Natural animal hide is easy on the hands for beginners and children

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. This company produces musical instruments in Asia, then imports them to sell at a low price. The wood, skins and hardware appear to be sturdy and of good quality. Fit and finish are better then expected. Very good value for the money. Drums are not my primary instrument, but I know enough about percussion to evaluate these bongos competently. High, low, open and muted tones are clear and distinct. I will be playing for fun at home and with casual drumming circles. I may occasionally use them on my music tracks. These are fine for my intended purposes.
customer_reviews.author: John Douglas Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: OKAY quality
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this set for professional-every day players or moderate players. I am a professional player and do not think this set with last very long if it's player often. I currently use it once in a blue moon when I'm alone at home. I'm not sure what animal skin it is but it doesn't feel that strong. I would definitely recommend this set to beginners. I don't regret buying the product because I just wanted a set in my home that I can causally play.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok but not great once you tune them up
customer_reviews.text: First set arrived broken, the drum head was cracked, Second one the metal frame was rusted. Sounds ok but not great once you tune them up. Kept the second set because I did'nt feel like going though returning them a second time.
customer_reviews.author: sage schiller

customer_reviews.title: flawed !
customer_reviews.text: The reason I'm giving it two stars is when tuned properly it sounds pretty good. But, when I try to tune it up higher due to stretching of the skin.The lug clamps turn as I tighten the nut with the wrench. One of the nuts on the 6" would loosen, or tighten, even after taking it off the rim and using an adjustable wrench and pliers the nut would not move. I determined that some of the nuts are not threaded properly to the clamps. I see this issue occurring with the 7" head as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marty.l

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with the quality of this product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the quality of this product for the price. I ordered this for my Husband (who is a drummer) to use with our daughter and they have been really enjoying playing together. Great size for adults as well as tiny toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Bongo Review
customer_reviews.text: When it first came, the bongos came sounding very weird. Eventually, it sounded a bit better. The only insane issue is how the middle part that holds both of the bongos together didn't seem to be glued completely. While it didn't impact the sound, it made the instrument appear bad and this made it kinda weird to hold. Overall, sounds great but seems like the company sends occasionally damaged instruments. I'd be careful but it might be my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: 6 inch head broke. What kind of material is that anyway. Cant find replacement head> I have improvised some improvements in the construction. Guess I will use the old ring and install some leather. I am told old xray film also works.
customer_reviews.author: Cudjoe

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bongos to introduce music to my 7 year old daughter. I was surprised at the quality of the construction for the price paid. I am not a professional, so I can't speak to how they sound in comparison to more expensive bongos, but I can tell you that these sound very good to us. I would consider them excellent value for your money. My daughter and I have been playing them for about 5 months now and they are still in very good shape and sound great! I am very happy With the purchase and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Duane G Orris

customer_reviews.title: Great for hippie drum circles
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Tunable. Maybe concert quality. Probably not recording quality. Great for hippie drum circles.
customer_reviews.author: Buystuff

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my brother-in-law who is a big musician and he absolutely loves them. Out of the box, they have a slight animal skin smell due to the drum portions, but animal skin is the covering I suppose. Really nice sound to them and easily tunable, if needed. Great price to boot! I added this item to my wish list and watched the price fluctuate over the holidays gaining $10 and coming down $10. Finally got the pair for $45.00 which I thought was a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MizunoRunRun

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality Bungo Drums for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: The drums are sturdy and very well made. Our two-year-old really enjoys drums. He played with the drum set for over an hour. He used some wooden spoons from the kitchen do you know and the drums didn't have any damage. Both spoons broke!! I highly recommend ordering these drums !!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Bongos.
customer_reviews.text: Super Bad! Do not purchase. These don't sound anything like they should. Of course, you get what you pay for. If you want to start out or practice, these are affordable, though I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OGMontufar7

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: One of the plastic feet was already broken upon arrival, which is why I knocked off a point. Not sure if the other three will hold up. The sound seems good but I'm not an expert although it is not as loud or or have as much reverberation as I hoped. Seem to be made well all things considering and it's fun to play. I would probably get this again as I think it's of good quality and I might just need a bigger set of bongos for the sound I was hoping for. These are the size I expected though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Might be okay for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I was not satisfied with these bongos. I could not get them to tune very well, and the sound from them was very dead, at any tuning. One tuning post was stripped on the higher tone drum, as well. These might be fine for beginners, but bongos aren't something that you really want to purchase via the internet, IMO. You need to try them out in person, sort of like a pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bongo Drums
customer_reviews.text: The Drums are fun to play and look great also there very easy to tune they sound great but would recommend a bongo stand for them it makes it easier to play them then trying to hold them I bought a stand at a music store Amazon would be a little cheaper than where I bought mine at but didn't want to wait on the shipping and if the DVD Bongo Grooves For Beginners is offered with them I would highly recommend to buy them together.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sprauer

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Suprisingly good quality for the price. I liked the dark wood, which you don't always see. I tested them out, then I gave them to my dad for Christmas, and he loved the idea. They come with a tuning wrench. I don't love the logos on the drum heads, but I won't take a star off for that. I believe they'll look and sound better with age.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Grandkid gift
customer_reviews.text: Just another cChristmas gift for the grandkid, parents wouldn’t take them home, lol. Not too loud when you play them and not bang them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Magic

customer_reviews.title: Solid bongos for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid bongos for the price- these are the second set I actually bought (the first left with a friend) and they aren't quite as nice as the first set, but after some tuning they play nicely and sound the about the way I want bongos to sound. The price is tough to beat- for $40 you are not going to find better bongos!
customer_reviews.author: ford escort serviceTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Loved the size and sound of this great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and sound of this great product. We keep it by the TV and break out in to song and dance when great songs come on. Excellent product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kram Nossungam

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of bongos....
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It is well made and comes with a turning key to adjust the sound. He is having a lot of fun with it. Wish it came with ear plugs though... I suggest you order some plugs if getting this for anyone else other that yourself. Believe me, you are going to need it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: its a good introduction to bongo
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its a good introduction to bongo. Mine came out of tune. The big drum was tuned higher to the little drum. Do a youtube on how to tune bongos and you are all set. I suspect better bongos sound better and cost more. But these are perfect for beginners. I'm going to use for decoration, something to do, or for camping out by the campfire. Pass it around.
customer_reviews.author: C C.

customer_reviews.title: Welcome surprise at this price
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I'm very happy with these bongos. The skins are smooth on top but blemishes are visible on the underside. They needed tuned when received but I expected that. Wood finish is acceptable. Once tuned they provide an acceptable consistent tone. Not "professional" equipment but very suitable for our living room spontaneous concerts.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: exactly as stated, awesome bongos. Great look, great feel, great sound would recommend for sure. Was a great purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you're serious...
customer_reviews.text: Well, they're bongos, I guess, but the diameter is wrong and these are honestly the worst natural skins I have ever come across. I suspect that the many positive reviewers have never owned a natural-skin drum before, or else they're buying them for a child's toy. These are bad bongos that look like good bongos in a picture.
customer_reviews.author: mattyd

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the material of the set sticking out
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the material of the set sticking out, but you get what you pay for. It is a bit heavy duty, my husband is a musician and said it is surprisingly good for the price. Sound is not top quality, but ok. My 1yr old loves it. He is musically inclined and doesn't really play with toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average.
customer_reviews.text: I am in no way a bongo professional. I was able to tell that the tuning was effective and the two drums could easily compliment one another. However, I was looking for something with a bit more resonance with the bass and higher high. Average quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: ... the price but the sound is just a little dull and it is too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price but the sound is just a little dull and it is too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My one year old grandson loves them. He gets them out and plays them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: The carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Better than Feynan's I don't know or do I Got ...
customer_reviews.text: Better than Feynan's I don't know or do I Got to love physics
customer_reviews.author: Automata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice Bongs. Tuned to f# and g# out of box. Groovetown and pitter patter
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McQuiston

customer_reviews.title: Students love it and so do I !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing once tuned. The larger drum needs to be tuned low and the small high... I also learned how to tune it to sound like Hindi drums... so it has a wide range of tone pitches.
customer_reviews.author: Verified User

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun to play.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to idle away some time between projects in my workshop. They're good exercise for your arms! I really have no musical talent so I can't comment on tuning them, but they do come with a wrench for doing so. They're fun to beat on and seem to be well made,
customer_reviews.author: Txmooseman

customer_reviews.title: Rusty with a smell
customer_reviews.text: Received item today. Not sure if i got a used item but most of the tightening bolts are rusty. There is also a noticeable smell which may be from the drum material or the abundance of glue that was used to assemble the drum. I will be returning this item. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bongos for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to use these and very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: but they don't sound that great to me
customer_reviews.text: Just a little bit on the cheap side. I got them as a gift and I don't play the drums, so I'm no expert, but they don't sound that great to me.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter

customer_reviews.title: He lugs them around and is pretty rough with them and they've stood up
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my toddler. He lugs them around and is pretty rough with them and they've stood up.
customer_reviews.author: StingRaySam

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and a nice sound
customer_reviews.text: This is heavier than I imagined, but it is a quality product. I am in the process of learning and I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: mayzey

customer_reviews.title: Not for pro's but great for funning around.
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional musician, so I can't compare them to pro level gear. Was a percussionist & drum line player in high school 40 years ago. For someone to have fun, they're great & a super value. If you're a pro you might not care for them. I love em though!
customer_reviews.author: High Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Spelling is wrong
customer_reviews.text: This drum manufacturer is definitely from China. And they don't know how to spell "musician". They spelled it "musiclan".....twice. Right on top of the skins. Lol!!!!! What a shame..... :( I wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, but a higher quality brand
customer_reviews.text: They become our of tune easily. One of the heads split within the first few weeks
customer_reviews.author: fat acke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old Grandson, he loved it. I want one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Justjo

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Present!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old neighbor as a toy, but they are not a toy at all. They are solid, durable, and sound fantastic. It even comes with a turn key to adjust the sound. Charlie's mom went and bought ear plugs because he is so attached to them. Great buy! Definitely would recommend these not just for children.
customer_reviews.author: olga powers

customer_reviews.title: These are the bongos you want
customer_reviews.text: Very nice professional sound. Easy to tune, portable, and can be played anywhere. Whether you're in a drum circle, playing an acoustic set, or just screwing around, these bongos get the job done. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lescouflair

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice drum my kid did not love I do not know why. When other kids come by it is a hit and they play. Appears good quality I have little musically knowledge
customer_reviews.author: Environmental suburan mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Tried to tighten the bolt to tighten the head. Thread was cross threaded. Bolt snapped.
customer_reviews.author: jason martinez

customer_reviews.title: thin skins?
customer_reviews.text: granted, i'm no skilled percussionist, the skins seem a little paper thin. I hope they dont break. Other people say theyve bought them for children, so i'd imagine the bongos arent as sensitive as they feel. Also, mine came with no tuning wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Well made, not much sound.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine and cane as advertised, has bo bongo sound ( no reverberation at all), not like any we played at the music shop.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The sound is very good and it's made with very good materials. They feel very professional and they are a lot of fun to use. I'm very satisfied with them and will recommend them to anyone who is looking for good bongos for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Suliveras

customer_reviews.title: Don't use with drumsticks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it suggested sticks so i got them. All i can tell you is my child 4 liked using the sticks and 4 mo later they are both busted, ripped and no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Knight

customer_reviews.title: its okay not for professional band playing all the time
customer_reviews.text: 6" head broke after normal playing few times , tried contacting seller to get replacement head , no such luck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter's birthday. She loves them as they make noise, but not too much for Mommy & Daddy to have to listen to. These were one of her favorites and she has had them for 3 weeks now, and still plays them.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Much better in quality sound wise.
customer_reviews.text: This set of bongo drums was perfect in sound better than other set I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! First order received, one of the bongos was hollow and ripped, replacement set had mold on both bongos.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kehle

customer_reviews.title: Great bongos
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little bongo set. My daughter loves them. They are super durable. I love that they come with tools to adjust the bongos if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyLeslie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, drum skin was dry-rotted.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap bongos for playing around with, and you get what you pay for. Mine had a drum skin that was clearly dry-rotted, and needs replaced. The craftsmanship on the rest of the drum is passable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaizen Zenkai

customer_reviews.title: I figured these would be nice for him to practice at home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son who plays the drums in the school band. I figured these would be nice for him to practice at home. He loves them. They have a very nice quality. They sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Neidig

customer_reviews.title: Great product but I can't find a replacement head for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I can't find a replacement head for the smaller side. My son banged it with his toy hammer.
customer_reviews.author: OceandriaX

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of bongos, make sure kids don't use them as a step stool(doh!)
customer_reviews.author: steve gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Sons Likes them.
customer_reviews.text: These are small little bongos and my 14 year old son like them. Comes with a tuning tool. The heads seem to be really nice and tight. We aren't bongo experts but the sound is really nice and they fit nicely in between your knees.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Where to buy the replacement bongo heads that will fit this bongo
customer_reviews.text: The bongo is good. I suppose I tightened the skin a little to much recently and the bongo skin tore. Where can I buy the replacement skin for this bongo.
customer_reviews.author: Advait Gode

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Solid and heavy duty feel.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Solid and heavy duty feel. Comes with tuning wrench. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Byron C.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but better for advanced player
customer_reviews.text: Was nice but hard to learn for a 1st time user. It came with a stain on one of the drums which we did not like so we return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. Looking to get a stand for these and the congos to go along side to complete the set. Great quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Storm  Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Head for small drum needed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the pair and enjoyed until the small head ruptured easily. Looking to replace skin, and had been hard to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin or Synthetic? Either one it is a no go
customer_reviews.text: Poor craftsmanship all around. Unable to tune because the top cracked as I tightened it. Spend the extra 30 bucks and get a good set of bongos.
customer_reviews.author: Lima Mike

customer_reviews.title: I would probably have opted for some better if I had done more research
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound, maybe a little cheap but you get what you pay for. I would probably have opted for some better if I had done more research. It's fine for just playing around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Asni

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Instrument
customer_reviews.text: Fun little instrument. We use it more as a decorative item but the grandkids like to play them.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a nice set of bongos. Very heavy and well constructed. Very easy to tune, they sound awesome. The bolts connecting the two were very loose when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great bongos for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, tunable so that they're easy to make sound great, and downright pretty! The inclusion of a tuning wrench was a great touch. Not a single thing to complain about with these!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love these, they look beautiful and the price just ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! I love these, they look beautiful and the price just blew me away. Don't let this value pass on by.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: BonGo for it!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a christmas gift for my brother. Well made and great quality for the price. Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: HailBop

customer_reviews.title: Great bongos!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son as a starter set. He loves them. Great quality for the price. We need to figure out how to tune them, but they sound great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Butts

customer_reviews.title: Best bongos
customer_reviews.text: These came in ready to play, they are beautifully crafted and sound great
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Meche

customer_reviews.title: They produce great sound. Nice for any percussionist
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves these. They produce great sound. Nice for any percussionist.
customer_reviews.author: OhioNDfan

customer_reviews.title: product as advertised delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at a great price. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: DaveK

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad he lives down the street because he hasn't quit ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 7 year old grandson. I'm glad he lives down the street because he hasn't quit playing on them since they arrive. Great price and they are a great set for beginingers!
customer_reviews.author: TopCat

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for someone and he LOVES them. They have a strong sound so playing them inside can get loud, especially for our dog!
customer_reviews.author: F.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for what is worth
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but don't expect a professional sound. Good for kids and gringos whom do not know how a good bongo sounds. replacing the skin for professional ones should make it a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Ponceño Universal

customer_reviews.title: :/ in opp d
customer_reviews.text: You can't ask for much more for the price. My 3 and 5 year olds love then.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good at this low price. Not cheesy or toy-like.
customer_reviews.text: I'd still like to get the Meinle set at three times the cost, but for a budget-friendly set of bongos, these are great. My son is a drummer and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: EMW

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife and she loves them. Great quality and sound bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jenializ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Need to be slightly tuned other than that as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: but she does love to play
customer_reviews.text: these things are solid. kinda heavy for my 3 year old to carry around the house, but she does love to play them
customer_reviews.author: Bill P

customer_reviews.title: My fiance loved them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a gift for my fiance, and he loves them. He plays them all of the time, and they are very sturdy and not cheap looking at all. I would recommend these to anyone wanting to buy bongos.
customer_reviews.author: WesleyD

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, quality construction and fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, quality construction and fair price. Good tone, and nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for Christmas along with a drum kit. He loves it! It was already put together and ready out of the box. He can use these to drum his beats when it's too late for his drums.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great and are adjustable so not sour notes. Play alone with your favorite songs or just improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Dean

customer_reviews.title: It was a Christmas gift for my grandson who is ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my grandson who is in his second year of beat club. He is crazy about it.
customer_reviews.author: vanderploeg nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tones and we use it for family music night
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Stockdale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger and better than I anticipated. Really good drums for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: xidarx

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with the materials it was made but you pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Redz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my two year old for xmas and he loves them, he won't stop beating on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun, I played them all day long once I got them. And there's not a kids toy, it a real sturdy adult bongo.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas and he LOVES them! He plays them often and my kids love playing them too. I do wish a user guide would have been included to assist a novice player. Luckily, you can find lots of informative videos on YouTube. Overall, the bongos are a big hit, seem well made and have a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: cn

customer_reviews.title: They sound really good. A very good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Very solid bongos. They sound really good. A very good price for the quality, its a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Rod.

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st set of bongos I ever owned, but they seem very well made and sound good with very little break in time. A family member who has been in bands his whole life said he was impressed for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan W. Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set of Bongos! Easy to tune with the supplied wrench. This is a set built to last!
customer_reviews.author: Bill J. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: cracked drum running down the entire side upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: No drum expert here but pretty sure there's not supposed to be a crack running down the entire side of the drum, from inside to out. It was probably caused by the carrier because of it's poor packaging (it was double boxed but only a single row of plastic bubbles on ONE side to keep the heads from being damaged). Also the middle piece of wood holding the two drums together keeps coming lose after every play, like the wood is stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good basic set for travelling or acoustic gigs. Tuneable heads make it nice to get the pitch one is looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the size
customer_reviews.text: Guess I didn't read the description very well. These were much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Teryn

product_meta.title: GP Percussion BRW2 Pro Birch Wood Tunable Bongos In Dark Brown Finish, inch
product_meta.description: Color:Dark BrownPro-Series Tunable Bongo Drums. These 6 inch and 7 inch drums feature Birch shells and natural hide heads. 4 Tunable lugs per drum with tuning wrench. Nickel-plated rim and cast base rim. highlights the wood's grain. Protective rubber feet.
feature_bullets: 6 inch and 7 inch drums feature Birch shells
4 Tunable lugs per drum with tuning wrench
Nickel-plated rim and cast base rim
